channel.title: **{Peekay} (24/7) Custom Lands, Custom Stats ~~Join Now~~
channel.description:
[size=22pt]Ok, Peekay is now Administrated by me, due to total noob children having no hold on maintaining it[/size].
[b]Peekay has been up for over 2 months and never had a single moments downtime, except for a few changes here and there.[/b]
I would also like to apologize for having a terrible co-owner who couldn't even speak english properly, I know that caused alot of frustration among all of our players. I had not even thought Poor grammar would affect a server, but now I can see it really does.
Here is the Current Staff list : {Admin x1} Me (D u b z) [Mod x1] 99flats, I am looking for VERY MATURE mods to help maintain the server. I will not just look at applications and choose from there. I will be watching everyone who has posted a application and make my best judgement to decide who will become part of our staff.
[font=Verdana]~~ [size=22pt]More about Peekay [/size] ~~[/font]
** Currently hosting a Vps (virtual private server) from Www.Kickassvps.com -- Have had them for the past year and they have never let me down, so I am sticking with them at the moment.
** Server is Rscd_v25, With many changes and Tweaks, Some of these include: New Stats, New Landscape, New Backgrounds, and New Items.
** 6 quests being implemented sometime this week: (heroes, lost city, vampire slayer, cooks assistant, dragon slayer, and imp catcher.
~~ [size=22pt]What you can expect from Peekay[/size] ~~
** We will not be shutting down, I am not saying we will be up for [u]YEARS[/u], I am just saying that you will not be wasting your time leveling or overall just game playing.
** I do strive in meeting or responding to all requests as far as : Bans, Help, and Suggestions. I know how it feels to wait on responses from other server Administrators or Moderators.
** Great updates and overall game play.
~~ [size=22pt]About Me [/size] ~~
My name is Cody, I just turned 20 on January 19th, I am from Crawfordsville, Indiana (U.S) I have only played Rsc I logged into Rs2 Beta, laughed and logged out. I had a 2 year grace period when I got locked up for multiple probation violations. When I got out I played Rsc for a little while and got very bored with lack of players and lack of overall activity. In Early 2008 I came to these forums and seen Rsc Private servers coming into affect. I had no knowledge when it came to java or even setting up a Rsc Private Server. So I posted on here and found some useful tutorials. Also thanks to Bigh51 a.k.a firewithin3, he did help me out alot and pointed me in the right direction. I had made some bad decisions pertaining to my first server Rsc-Remix and obviously found out, that I had chose the wrong people to help me run it. Around June 2008 I turned Rsc-Remix into Rsc-Pkz due to a majority vote to make it a overall Pking server, not a skilling server. My source was released and you can find it on dayles sticky in Rsc Development. Since my last server I have also done the same thing to my second server. My server name was Rsc-Saints, it was a replica of Rsca but without as many updates and structure, but it did have a more complete combat system. I have now turned it into a Pking server, called Peekay (Peekay, because that was my overall favorite pking server ever made, I dont know if thats because it was one of the first I played or because the overall game experience was awesome.) This server is staying as it is, I will not be changing the format of the game anymore.
~~ Server Details ~~
** Xp rate is around 75x ** New custom stuff, pictures show some ** New stats, dueling & pking, but mine were not bought and were implemented first. ** Working Webclient ** Great Staff, Currently there is only 99flats and I but there will be more mature mods to come.
~~ Pictures ~~ [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/5581/22125831ao6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8163/67878853dh4.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img240.imageshack.us/img240/6426/31558405ci7.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/1791/96605627qa7.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img240.imageshack.us/img240/6204/99318120sr0.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/6095/15864179gd6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/7867/43263449xm3.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/6126/43071897uh1.jpg[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://img265.imageshack.us/img265/4286/61534507dv5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/7456/23919300uw7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/6412/17298165op7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/384/36863912ul5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/457/10618350dq1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/9313/10209057eo0.jpg[/img]
************ More Updates ****************
*New locations thanks to Xent,Peter, and Vrunk
Also working on 3 mini events to work in the new landscapes, and have added a huge city in the high lvl wild for more pking and mini events. Will post pictures of that soon.
Here are the recent ones. No npcs or doors added yet, I'm kinda lazy at the moment.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/8013/24859710eh1.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/6048/pk1sd2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/3553/pk2ks9.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=22pt]]******** New Cities **********[/size] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/8/pk3ty1.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt]***** New Quests *****[/size]
New quest - Fight your way through MANY npcs, collecting the right items to give back to *****, he had lost them during the night, when a bunch of thieves ambushed his house and took 5 certain things, ***** says that he will pay very handsomley for his items returned, But be careful the thieves also have 4 dummy items they are willing to give you instead of ***** items. Choosing wrong will result in going back through the maze and collecting the right ones until you get it totally right.

item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

[quote=“wat72, post:55, topic:258285”][quote author=dear god link=topic=341058.msg2650729#msg2650729 date=1233514740]

[quote author=wat72 link=topic=341058.msg2650610#msg2650610 date=1233508452]

aha this server is a joke…

Dont waste your time, the staffs are shitty
[/quote]Your grammar is really really bad. It should be “Aha, this server is a joke. Don’t waste your time, the staff on this server are shitty.” not whatever you typed. Also, they’re not shitty.

Using the same word twice in a sentence isn’t gramatically correct either.
[/quote]Actually, it is. Also, it’s spelled grammatically not gramatically.[/quote]

We weren’t on the subject of spelling. But if i wanted to browse around the forums and find a typo you made then i could. I won’t though because it’s wasting more time then i already am replying to this.

And no, in the english language, it is incorrect to use the same word twice in one sentence. The same rule applies for double negatives.
